casebody.data:
GOOD HOPE
v.
NCDHHS. No. 58A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 20, 2006. Maureen D. Murray, Susan M. Fradenburg, Greensboro, William W. Stewart, Jr., Raleigh, for Good Hope Health System. C. Winston Gilchrist, Lillington, for Town of Lillington. Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Marcus Lodge, for NCDHHS. Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Wallace C. Hollowell, III, Benjamin N. Thompson, K. Edward Greene, Kathleen A. Naggs, Raleigh, Denise M. Gunther, Winston-Salem, for Betsy Johnson Regional Hosp. S. Todd Hemphill, Diane E. Ricketts, Raleigh, for Amisub of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of February 2006 by NC Hospital Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of February 2006."
